aircraft.value: Kestrel Patrol - AC-8089-325 at Forward Operating Base-2

defect_observed.value: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 16/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 19/06/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 19/06/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 21/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 24/06/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
